DOC.brief_summary: The Bravewell Integrative Medicine Research Network ( BraveNet ) newly form practice-based research network nine lead integrative medicine center around U.S. collaborate clinical outcome research increase knowledge evidence-base integrative medicine .
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims BraveNet : 1 . Demonstrate feasibility nine site BraveNet coordinate specify data element , develop implement smooth data collection procedure , analyze data , publish disseminate result scientific conference journal . 2 . Describe patient seek care Integrative Medicine center , term : 1. demographic , present symptom , health condition , type care seek , expectation treatment ; 2. quality life , mood , stress ; 3. lifestyle factor . 3 . Explore potential pattern within sample [ e.g. , survey score vary demographic , condition , type patient ( new v return ) , type help seek , etc. ] . 4 . Utilize data pilot data future study fund opportunity . Up five hundred eligible patient see nine participate Centers approach ( mail , phone , time visit , etc . ) invite consent paper pencil study . The patient survey clearly state participation voluntary write consent participate front . Individual practice report response rate order monitor potential effect volunteer bias . Participant completion questionnaire take 15 30 minute , complete within 2 week patient visit. , The corresponding provider form complete provider/research staff within 5 day visit . Measures : 1 . Baseline Questionnaires - Demographics reason visit 2 . Quality Life . The SF-12 ( Short Form 12 ) 3 . Mood ( Depression ) . The Center Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale ( CES-D ) 4 . Stress . The Perceived Stress Scale ( PSS ) 5 . Visual Analog Scales ( VAS ) . Four self-report VASs use measure aspect pain , fatigue restfulness sleep . 6 . Provider Form . Providers/ Research Staff complete form indicate type provider see , CPT code use describe/bill service , service provide , provider 's assessment current medical conditions/co-morbidities .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible inclusion study follow criterion apply : 1 . Age : At least 18 year age . 2 . Patient Status : Participants eligible see individually type clinician day visit . 3 . English Spanish Literacy : Ability read write English Spanish confirm site personnel ability provide inform consent . Subjects exclude study follow criterion apply : 1 . Cognitive Impairment : A subject eligible he/she history psychiatric disease , dementia , Alzheimer 's disease , condition limit validity providing inform consent participate study . 2 . Inability read write English Spanish . 3 . Participating educational Center activity , clinical patient .
